author: Bloomberg
title: COVID19: Virus outbreak pits treating patients against finding a cure - Times of India
description: COVID19: Virus outbreak pits treating patients against finding a cure Times of India View Full coverage on Google News
content:
Pharmaceutical-research experts are raising concerns that attempts to offer desperate coronavirus patients some form of treatment may hobble crucial studies of which drugs actually work and which ones don't.
